text: Tell me what Acute Myeloid Leukemia is
Can you tell me what AML is
Can you tell me what Acute Myeloid Leukemia is
Will you tell me what Acute Myeloid Leukemia is
responses: Acute Myeloid Leukemia, or AML, is a rare form of Leukemia where mutated white blood cells attack and kill healthy red cells.
Acute Myeloid Leukemia, or AML, is a rare and agressive form of Leukemia. With AML, mutated white blood cells attack and kill healthy red cells.
Acute Myeloid Leukemia, or AML, is a rare and agressive form of Leukemia. With AML, mutated white blood cells kill healthy red cells.

text: Who does Acute Myeloid Leukemia affect?
What age group does AML affect?
What age group does Acute Myeloid Leukemia affect?
How old do you have to be to get AML?
How old do you have to be to get Acute Myeloid Leukemia?
Does Acute Myeloid Leukemia affect older or younger people?
responses: According to cancer.org, AML is generally a disease of older people and is uncommon before the age of 45. The average age of people when they are first diagnosed with AML is about 68. But AML can occur in children as well.

text: Tell me about the AML Detection System
Tell me about the Acute Myeloid Leukemia Detection System
Can you tell me more about AML Detection System
Can you tell me more about Acute Myeloid Leukemia Detection System
What is the AML Detection System?
What is the Acute Myeloid Leukemia Detection System?
Will you tell me more about what the Acute Myeloid Leukemia Detection System is
responses: The AML (Acute Myeloid Leukemia) Detection System is an open source Acute Myeloid Leukemia Detection System including data management, training and running facial and image classifiers on the edge with Intel technologies. The project includes an Android chatbot app, a natural language understanding engine, a convolutional neural network classifier, a siamese neural network classifier and  a locally hosted web based UI. This project is part of the Peter Moss Acute Myeloid Leukemia AI Research Project.

text: Tell me about the Peter Moss AML AI Research Project

Can you tell me more about the AML AI Research Project

What is the AML AI Research Project?
What is the Acute Myeloid Leukemia Detection AI Research Project?
Will you tell me more about what the Acute Myeloid Leukemia Detection AI Research Project is
responses: The Acute Myeloid Leukemia AI Research Project is an open source project researching and developing Artificial Intelligence for early detection of AML and for drug discovery.
